name: js-framework-house
description: house for building all your projects

scripts.all: run(){ npm run runner make $1; npm run show;}; run
scripts.fixAll: run(){ npm run runner fix $1;}; run
scripts.runner: run(){ npm run $1 vue @vue/cli $2; npm run show; npm run $1 angular @angular/cli $2; npm run $1 ember ember-cli $2; npm run $1 cra create-react-app $2; npm run $1 preact preact-cli $2; }; run
scripts.i: run(){ mkdir $1; cp .$10.json $1/package.json; cd $1; npm install $2 --save; }; run
scripts.app: run(){ cd $1; npm run $1 $2; npm run serve $2; }; run
scripts.show: dir(){ for d in ./*/ ; do (cd "$d" && echo "$d" && $*); done; }; echo 'project update: look at all of the cool projects! âœ¨ âœ¨ ðŸŒˆ '; dir ls
scripts.testWillDeletePreviousContent: rm -rf ember; npm run cleanup; npm run setup; npm run all example;
scripts.test: rm -rf */example; npm run show; npm run all example;
scripts.fix: run(){ cd $1; mv package-lock.json .old.package-lock.json; rm -rf node_modules; cat package.json | grep $2 >> .historical_record.txt; cp ../.$10.json package.json; npm install $2 --save;}; run
